title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 12 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 12 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: And Job answered and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯回答说，

lineList.en: No doubt but ye are the people, and wisdom shall die with you.
lineList.cn: 你们真是子民哪，你们死亡，智慧也就灭没了。

lineList.en: But I have understanding as well as you; I am not inferior to you: yea, who knoweth not such things as these?
lineList.cn: 但我也有聪明，与你们一样，并非不及你们。你们所说的，谁不知道呢。

lineList.en: I am as one mocked of his neighbour, who calleth upon God, and he answereth him: the just upright man is laughed to scorn.
lineList.cn: 我这求告神，蒙他应允的人，竟成了朋友所讥笑的。公义完全人，竟受了人的讥笑。

lineList.en: He that is ready to slip with his feet is as a lamp despised in the thought of him that is at ease.
lineList.cn: 安逸的人，心里藐视灾祸。这灾祸常常等待滑脚的人。

lineList.en: The tabernacles of robbers prosper, and they that provoke God are secure; into whose hand God bringeth abundantly.
lineList.cn: 强盗的帐棚兴旺，惹神的人稳固，神多将财物送到他们手中。

lineList.en: But ask now the beasts, and they shall teach thee; and the fowls of the air, and they shall tell thee:
lineList.cn: 你且问走兽，走兽必指教你。又问空中的飞鸟，飞鸟必告诉你。

lineList.en: Or speak to the earth, and it shall teach thee: and the fishes of the sea shall declare unto thee.
lineList.cn: 或与地说话，地必指教你。海中的鱼也必向你说明。

lineList.en: Who knoweth not in all these that the hand of the LORD hath wrought this?
lineList.cn: 看这一切，谁不知道是耶和华的手做成的呢。

lineList.en: In whose hand is the soul of every living thing, and the breath of all mankind.
lineList.cn: 凡活物的生命，和人类的气息，都在他手中。

lineList.en: Doth not the ear try words? and the mouth taste his meat?
lineList.cn: 耳朵岂不试验言语，正如上膛尝食物吗。

lineList.en: With the ancient is wisdom; and in length of days understanding.
lineList.cn: 年老的有智慧，寿高的有知识。

lineList.en: With him is wisdom and strength, he hath counsel and understanding.
lineList.cn: 在神有智慧和能力，他有谋略和知识。

lineList.en: Behold, he breaketh down, and it cannot be built again: he shutteth up a man, and there can be no opening.
lineList.cn: 他拆毁的，就不能再建造。他捆住人，便不得开释。

lineList.en: Behold, he withholdeth the waters, and they dry up: also he sendeth them out, and they overturn the earth.
lineList.cn: 他把水留住，水便枯乾。他再发出水来，水就翻地。

lineList.en: With him is strength and wisdom: the deceived and the deceiver are his.
lineList.cn: 在他有能力和智慧。被诱惑的，与诱惑人的，都是属他。

lineList.en: He leadeth counsellors away spoiled, and maketh the judges fools.
lineList.cn: 他把谋士剥衣掳去，又使审判官变成愚人。

lineList.en: He looseth the bond of kings, and girdeth their loins with a girdle.
lineList.cn: 他放松君王的绑，又用带子捆他们的腰。

lineList.en: He leadeth princes away spoiled, and overthroweth the mighty.
lineList.cn: 他把祭司剥衣掳去，又使有能的人倾败。

lineList.en: He removeth away the speech of the trusty, and taketh away the understanding of the aged.
lineList.cn: 他废去忠信人的讲论，又夺去老人的聪明。

lineList.en: He poureth contempt upon princes, and weakeneth the strength of the mighty.
lineList.cn: 他使君王蒙羞被辱，放松有力之人的腰带。

lineList.en: He discovereth deep things out of darkness, and bringeth out to light the shadow of death.
lineList.cn: 他将深奥的事从黑暗中彰显，使死荫显为光明。

lineList.en: He increaseth the nations, and destroyeth them: he enlargeth the nations, and straiteneth them again.
lineList.cn: 他使邦国兴旺而又毁灭，他使邦国开广而又掳去。

lineList.en: He taketh away the heart of the chief of the people of the earth, and causeth them to wander in a wilderness where there is no way.
lineList.cn: 他将地上民中首领的聪明夺去，使他们在荒废无路之地漂流。

lineList.en: They grope in the dark without light, and he maketh them to stagger like a drunken man.
lineList.cn: 他们无光，在黑暗中摸索，又使他们东倒西歪，像醉酒的人一样。
